resources.string: As the name suggests, this pot pie is filled with chicken, and chicken only. No peas, carrots, celery, or anything else. Just chicken. Okay, and a creamy sauce and a few green onions. That\'s it, though. I was a little skeptical before trying it, but after baking it a few times I can say I really don\'t miss the peas and carrots. It\'s rich and delicious and a great way to use leftover chicken
This famous classic American cookie is a treat no matter what the age or occasion. Enjoy it with a glass of cold milk.

Beneath this towering yet unpretentious appearance lies multiple layers of moist, mildly spiced cake that are flecked with carrots and pecans and enveloped by a generous coating of cream cheese frosting.
These french fries are sort of blowing my mind. So crispy and loaded with yummy garlic and Italian flavors. I could never turn down garlic and cheese. On french fries nonetheless!.

These spring rolls are a refreshing change from the usual fried variety, and have become a family favorite. They are great as a cool summertime appetizer, and are delicious dipped in one or both of the sauces."

It\’s so delicious, it’s almost a crime. Top it with creamy, sinful, decadent, soul-inspiring homemade Hollandaise Sauce. Have you ever tasted Hollandaise Sauce, and I\’m not talking the stuff in the paper packet? It\’s dreamy. It\’s a triumph. And it\’s made with a lot of butter.

This recipe, is very simple. It\’s hard to go wrong with puff pastry, roasted garlic, and the first tomatoes of the season. It doesn\'t reinvent the wheel and stuck with a winning formula. It\’s extremely tasty.

This is quite an old fashioned recipe for this classic pie which is based upon a flour thickened, pudding-like custard pie filling. A proper coconut cream pie should be velvety and creamy, not jelly like at all. This recipe gets it right and the results are well worth the effort.

These goat cheese cigars are easy to make and consist of very few ingredients only. Now imagine the goat cheese with a sprinkle of honey and if you can find lavender honey, trust me, your taste buds are going to celebrate! And they are a true eye-catcher!
